Journal.Title: Physical medicine and rehabilitation clinics of North America
Journal.ISOAbbreviation: Phys Med Rehabil Clin N Am

Article.ArticleTitle: Integrated Care Models for Long Coronavirus Disease.

Abstract.AbstractText: Professional or governmental agencies and organizations have developed guidelines to define the problem and evaluate and manage patients with Post-Acute Sequelae of SARS CoV-2 (PASC). Multidisciplinary models largely exist in academic centers and larger cities; however, most care for PASC patients is provided by the primary care providers. The American Academy of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation has been in the forefront in releasing consensus statements as a part of the long COVID collaborative.
